participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and nurturing, loves to connect with others through shared interests.
participant_1.background: I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten. I work for an architect firm. I went on a quilting retreat in the mountains with my friends. I have an autograph collection with more than 2000 signatures. My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: creative and adventurous, enjoys exploring new places and expressing himself through art and music.
participant_2.background: I lost everything when the economy crashed. I enjoy wearing comfortable, casual clothing that lets me move freely while I play music and write stories. I recently moved to Florida. I really enjoy hiking. I am not married, but I love planning weddings.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing well. I just moved to Florida.
Oh nice! I've always wanted to visit Florida. What made you move there?
I lost everything when the economy crashed, so I decided to start over in a new place.
I'm sorry to hear that. But I'm glad you're doing well. What do you like to do for fun?
I love hiking and playing music. I also enjoy writing stories.
That sounds fun! I like to read mysteries. I also enjoy quilting.
Oh cool! I love reading mysteries too. I've never tried quilting, but it sounds interesting.
It's really relaxing. You should try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what's your favorite mystery book?
I really like the Poirot series by Agatha Christie.
Me too! Those are great books.
Yeah, they're so good. I'm always on the edge of my seat when I read them.
Me too! I'm glad you're a fan.
Thanks! I'm glad to meet someone else who enjoys mysteries.
Me too! It's nice to have someone to talk to about them.
